name: Tangram Attack
synopsis: Tangram Attack is a fast-paced slicing game with fiendish puzzles to test your mental agility. Slice and slash your way through hundreds of brain twisting puzzles and earn prestigious badges. Complete missions with Master Tan at the Academy to earn your stripes and unlock three addictive gameplay modes with endless replayability. Choose from Zen, Blitz and the insanely frantic Arcade mode to become the ultimate mental warrior.
